summary: Kabir Khan is the coach of the Indian Women's National Hockey Team and his dream is to make his all girls team emerge victorious against all odds.
cast: Shah Rukh Khan|Vidya Malvade|Sagarika Ghatge|Shilpa Shukla|Arya Menon|Seema Azmi|Nisha Nair|Sandia Furtado|Masochon V. Zimik|Kimi Laldawla|Chitrashi Rawat|Shubhi Mehta|Anaitha Nair|Tanya Abrol|Kimberly Miranda|Nichola Sequeira|Raynia Mascerhanas|Javed Khan|Vibha Chhibber|Jayshree Arora|Nakul Vaid|Vivan Bhatena|Mohit Chauhan|Chantelle Abela|Padam Bhushan|Lisa Blake|Ashleigh Paige Burt|Joshua Burt|Kasey Davis|Ramakant Dayma|Lauren Demetriou|Liz Duffield|Raj Joshi|Ravi Kachhawa|Rio Kapadia|Lalhmingkimi Khiangte|Celina Lazarus|Mary Lofthouse|Sarah O'Connor|Vicki Periorellis|Janine Pretorius|Ansh Rathore|Kate Sandry|Danielle Schubach|Kim Snowden|Anjan Srivastav|Jill van Duuren|Elizabeth Vardy|Emily White|Brodie Whitmore|Amanda Wilkinson|Aleesha Willett|Mirko Jukic|Nicholas Mifsud
title: Chak De! India
